languages.text: "Я тебе предложу забиться в гальюн, потому что я твою посудину перетряхну от борта до борта — ты до стольки считать не умеешь, сколько я кораблей на абордаж взял{mf||а}".
"I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."
languages.original_text: "Я тебе предложу забиться в гальюн, потому что я твою посудину перетряхну от борта до борта — ты до стольки считать не умеешь, сколько я кораблей на абордаж взял{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals, ignorant scum."

"I will offer you to lock yourself in the latrine, because I am going to shake up your sorry tub from side to side. Do you know how many ships I have boarded? You cannot count that high, ignorant scum."
"I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals, ignorant scum."
"I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals, ignorant scum."
"I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."
"I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."

languages.text: “我给你个机会，你去厕所里好好躲起来吧，因为我要把你这个破罐子从头到尾拆个干净。我这辈子上过的船，比你吃过的热乎饭还多。”
languages.original_text: "I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."

traits.locale_text: “我给你个机会，你去厕所里好好躲起来吧，因为我要把你这个破罐子从头到尾拆个干净。我这辈子上过的船，比你吃过的热乎饭还多，你这愚蠢的人渣。”
“我给你个机会，你去厕所里好好躲起来吧，因为我要把你这个破罐子从头到尾拆个干净。我这辈子上过的船，比你吃过的热乎饭还多，你这愚蠢的人渣。”

languages.text: 「君に便所に閉じこもるチャンスをやろう。なぜなら君のブリキ缶を船首から船尾まで揺さぶるつもりだからだ。{mf|俺|私}は君が飯を食った回数より多くの船に乗り込んできた」
languages.original_text: "I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."

traits.locale_text: 「君に便所に閉じこもるチャンスをやろう。なぜなら君のブリキ缶を船首から船尾まで揺さぶるつもりだからだ。{mf|俺|私}は君が飯を食った回数より多くの船に乗り込んできた」

languages.text: «Te ofreceré una oportunidad de encerrarte en el baño, porque estoy a punto de agitar tu tartana de proa a popa. He abordado más naves a lo largo de mi carrera que panes has comido».
languages.original_text: "I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."

traits.locale_text: «Te ofreceré una oportunidad de encerrarte en el baño, porque estoy a punto de agitar tu tartana de proa a popa. He abordado más naves a lo largo de mi carrera que panes has comido».

languages.text: "Ich gebe Euch Gelegenheit, Euch selbst auf dem Klo einzusperren, denn ich werde Eure Blechdose von Bug bis Heck ordentlich durchschütteln. Ich habe zu meiner Zeit mehr Schiffe geentert, als Ihr warme Mahlzeiten hattet."
languages.original_text: "I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe Euch Gelegenheit, Euch selbst auf dem Klo einzusperren, denn ich werde Eure Blechdose von Bug bis Heck ordentlich durchschütteln. Ich habe zu meiner Zeit mehr Schiffe geentert, als Ihr warme Mahlzeiten hattet."

languages.text: "Bir yerlere saklanman için sana şans tanıyacağım çünkü birazdan o teneke bozuntusunu öyle bir sarsacağım ki pruvasıyla kıçı yer değiştirecek. Senin içtiğin çorbadan fazla gemiyi basmışımdır ben."
languages.original_text: "I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."

traits.locale_text: "Bir yerlere saklanman için sana şans tanıyacağım çünkü birazdan o teneke bozuntusunu öyle bir sarsacağım ki pruvasıyla kıçı yer değiştirecek. Senin içtiğin çorbadan fazla gemiyi basmışımdır ben."

languages.text: « C'est votre dernière chance de vous enfermer aux toilettes dans votre boîte de conserve. Ça va secouer ! J'ai abordé plus de vaisseaux que vous n'avez eu de repas, croyez-moi. »
languages.original_text: "I will offer you a chance to lock yourself in the privy, because I am about to rattle your tin can from bow to stern. I've boarded more ships in my time than you've had hot meals."

traits.locale_text: « C'est votre dernière chance de vous enfermer aux toilettes dans votre boîte de conserve. Ça va secouer ! J'ai abordé plus de vaisseaux que vous n'avez eu de repas, croyez-moi. »
